title: WEN® Pomegranate Cleansing Conditioner 16oz
description: When your hair is under constant assault from the cold, the heat, the dryers, treatments, and processes, the last thing you need is harsh hair products that will further damage your tresses. This  universal cleansing conditioner is designed for all hair types and will effectively cleanse, moisturize, and invigorate without stripping or robbing your hair of natural nutrients.
